title: Blazor Web Assembly App with Azure B2C is always trying to authenticate as soon as page is loaded
body:
I am adding support for Azure AD B2C to a Blazor WebAssembly App, I followed the instructions here https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/blazor/security/webassembly/hosted-with-azure-active-directory-b2c?view=aspnetcore-3.1#client-app-configuration

however, the application is always trying to authenticate as soon as I load the page, which does not allow for a public anonymous section of the site. Is there any solution to this problem?
